meanings.definition: To throw in various random directions.
meanings.sent1: She scatters seeds in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The wind scatters the leaves across the yard.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel scatters nuts all over the yard.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter scatters like confetti in the air.
meanings.sent5: The magician scatters glitter during his performance.
